name: Timejump (R4menNoodles)
description:
TIMEJUMP

A game based on your family's legacy. You try and solve puzzles while jumping through time. In the past, you play as your ancestor in the 1860s, and in the current time, you play the descendant in the current day. Affecting the past affects the future.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Credits

Manager & Sound - Chris Brown 

Coder - Lukas Kreft

Overall Contributor - Clayton Kester

Overall Contributor - Kyle Lapine

Sprite Artist - Roman Connors

(Team #1 Pm Class)
